availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Burtchett. Father of John Burtchett, Elizabeth Burchett, Benjamin Burtchett, Nancy Burtchett, Thomas Burtchett, Silas Burchett, Drury Burtchett, Burrell Burtchett, Ann Burtchett, and Susannah Burtchett. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 216A-216B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 248.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 1, p. 95B.
Find A Grave, "Burrell Burtchett (1805-1882)," Memorial #132888817, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/132888817 (accessed January 17, 2020).
